Reviews.Title: Love my keyboard phone
Reviews.Author: AEA
Reviews.Content: I switched to a virtual keyboard and couldn't stand it. Finally I switched back to the Q10 and am so glad I did. The OS isn't the best, but the keyboard is terrific, and it's a great phone for combined business/personal use.

Reviews.Title: The Wife love the New Phone
Reviews.Author: Julio Lopez
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her new Q10 phone she got for her BDAY. She's a big fan of Backberry Phones and acesories

Reviews.Title: useful
Reviews.Author: Yjing
Reviews.Content: i like Blackberry cause physical keyboard is very useful for me,and BB always does well in this way.Many different between Q10 and 9000(i use 9000 before)but i think its better.in some ways.
